title: I’m an Adventurer! ~Musou Skill is Plane Magic~ - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Adventurers   Age Progression   Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Carefree Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Cheats   Complex Family Relationships   Conditional Power   Depictions of Cruelty   Determined Protagonist   Dungeons   Elves   Gore   Guilds   Hiding True Abilities   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Magical Technology   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Overpowered Protagonist   Programmer   Reincarnated in Another World   Ruthless Protagonist   S*ave Harem   S*aves   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Thieves   Unique Weapons   Wars   Weak to Strong
author: Misotakuan   みそたくあん
description:
A CG designer dies of illness and reincarnated in another world of swords and magic. He decides to live a second life as a free man, saying he doesn’t want to be a corporate employee anymore. But his reincarnation is at the bottom of society, the farthest thing from freedom, a slave’s child.

Nevertheless, he makes full use of the 3DCG-like magic he was accustomed to in his previous life, “Plane Magic”, and gradually becomes an adventurer. However, the environment surrounding him is gradually becoming more and more cynical, and soon the war between the great powers is turning into a war rage. He is caught up in a war that he did not want to be involved in…>
